title: Tara Strong's Voicelings
description: Voice acting course and community led by Tara Strong (Timmy Turner, Harley Quinn, Bubbles, Twilight Sparkle, Raven, and more). Online, self-paced: vocal techniques, character creation, audition prep, home studio, career development. Live events with industry guests, private community, gig board. Minimum age 13; under 18 requires guardian permission. Scholarships available.
